entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning.
